data.title: List of films based on comics
data.text:
This is a list based on comics. It includes films that are adaptations of comics, and those films whose characters originated in those comics.

As some languages and forms have been extensively adapted into films, they have their own entries:

List of films based on English-language comics

List of films based on Dark Horse Comics

List of films based on DC Comics

List of films based on Marvel Comics

List of films based on Image Comics

List of films based on Harvey Comics

List of films based on Archie Comics

List of films based on French-language comics

List of films based on manga

The following is a list of comic book films that has surpassed $1 million. Superhero films, comic strips and manga adaptations are not included as they have their own list. See List of highest grossing superhero films, Highest grossing comic strip films and Highest-grossing Manga films.

Studios [21] 18 Asterix at the Olympic Games $131,856,927 2008 Asterix Dargaud [22] 19 The King's Man $125,897,478 2021 kingsman image comics [23] 20 Atomic Blonde $100,014,025 2017 The Coldest City [24] 21 R.I.P.D. $78,324,220 2013 Rest in Peace Department [25] 22 I, Frankenstein $76,801,179 2014 I, Frankenstein Kevin Grevioux [26] 23 30 Days of Night $75,513,170 2007 30 Days of Night IDW [27] 24 From Hell $74,558,115 2001 From Hell Knockabout Comics [28] 25 A History of Violence $61,385,065 2005 A History of Violence DC Comics[29] 26 Asterix and Obelix: God Save Britannia $61,319,383 2012 Asterix Dargaud [30] 27 Marry Me $50,541,093 2022 Marry Me [31] 28 Asterix: The Secret of the Magic Potion $48,288,456 Asterix Dargaud [32] 29 Sin City: A Dame to Kill For $39,407,616 A Dame to Kill For Dark Horse Comics [33] 30 The Smurfs and the Magic Flute $19,000,000 The Smurfs 1976 [34]
